multiple_intelligences.spatial: Create visual representations or mind maps of transhumanism

multiple_intelligences.musical: Create a song or rhythm exercise about transhumanism

content.basic: Simplified texts and basic vocabulary about transhumanism
content.intermediate: Standard complexity materials with support about transhumanism
content.advanced: Complex authentic materials and academic texts about transhumanism

process.grouping: Individual, pairs, small groups, or whole class based on preference
process.choice: Multiple activity options aligned with learning style

differentiation.environment: Quiet space with good acoustics and audio equipment

warm_up.description: Students listen to audio about transhumanism and share reactions

main_activities.description: Students receive information about transhumanism through auditory modality
Students practice language related to transhumanism using auditory approach
Students produce original content about transhumanism demonstrating basic thinking

discussion_prompts: What do you know about transhumanism?

vocabulary_support.tier_3: Domain-specific technical terms related to transhumanism

teacher_notes.grouping_suggestions: Flexible grouping based on readiness and interest

Vocabulary may be challenging for some students

methodology: UDL + Differentiated Instruction + CLT + Multiple Intelligences
references: CAST Universal Design for Learning Guidelines
